Back to Snippet Index

Google Sheets JSON Data

HTML Table Code


<section class="table-responsive" id="specDetails">
<h2>Specification Details</h2>
  <table id="datadetails">
  </table>
<script id="spec-template" type="text/template">
{{#entry}}
  <tr>
      <td class="col1">{{gsx$desc1.$t}}</td>
      <td class="bd col2">{{gsx$data1.$t}}</td>
      <td class="col3">{{gsx$desc2.$t}}</td>
      <td class="bd col4">{{gsx$data2.$t}}</td>
      <td class="col5">{{gsx$desc3.$t}}</td>
      <td class="bd col6">{{gsx$data3.$t}}</td>
  </tr>
{{/entry}}
</script>
</section>

Javascript Code


$(function () {  
  $.getJSON("https://spreadsheets.google.com/feeds/list/1UaWeCOYaX6LUaxw-3EMkcxDd_tJcHVbivQzbou7XETI/1/public/values?hl=en_US&alt=json", function( data) {
    var template = $('#spec-template').html();
    var info = Mustache.to_html(template, data.feed);
    $('#datadetails').html(info);
    });
    });

CSS code


#specDetails {
  height: 100%;
}
#specDetails h2 {
  margin: 70px 0 5px 20px;
}
#specDetails #datadetails {
  margin: 0 20px 0 20px;
}
#specDetails .col1,
#specDetails .col3,
#specDetails .col5 {
  width: 11%;
}
#specDetails .col2,
#specDetails .col4,
#specDetails .col6 {
  width: 22%;
}
#specDetails td {
  text-align: right;
  font-size: .9em;
  padding: 4px 4px 4px 4px;
  border: 1px solid #bbb;
}
#specDetails td.bd {
  font-weight: 600;
  text-align: center;
}
